name: Roll With It (Autoquark, IanBadcoe, AntiRooster)
description:
Roll With It is a physics puzzler where you must use your single switch to guide balls along a track into goal areas. You'll often find that the switch controls multiple elements of the level at once, so you'll have to time your presses carefully to make sure each ball ends up in the right place at the right time.

Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Physics Jam by Ian Badcoe, James Badcoe and Nathan Hahn

Creative Commons Attributions

Sounds

Rolling sound adapted from: "foosball loop sound effect" by soundmast123 https://freesound.org/people/soundmast123/sounds/466031/
Ball dropping sound adapted from: "Ball on table.wav" by NeatoEnt https://freesound.org/people/NeatoEnt/sounds/458137/
Ball hit sounds adapted from: "Pool balls.wav" by bsumusictech https://freesound.org/people/bsumusictech/sounds/62331/
Gear sounds adapted from: "Running Gear" by Vurca https://freesound.org/people/Vurca/sounds/315753/
Background music adapted from "Space Ambient" by Osmic https://opengameart.org/content/space-ambient

Art

"Outer Space Skybox" by StumpyStrust https://opengameart.org/content/space-skyboxes-0
Cel Shader based on Cel Shader Tutorial by Daniel Ilett https://danielilett.com/2020-03-21-tut5-urp-cel-shading/
"level clipart" from clipart-library.com http://clipart-library.com/clipart/lever-cliparts_15.htm
